meanings.sent1: I quickly jouk to the side to avoid the flying ball.
meanings.sent2: She had to jouk past the obstacles to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The clever rabbit would jouk around the farmer's attempts to catch it.
meanings.sent4: His ability to jouk out of tricky situations amazed his friends.
meanings.sent5: Remember to jouk out of the way if something is coming towards you.

meanings.definition: A sudden movement to avoid something
meanings.sent1: With a swift jouk, she managed to avoid the falling branch.
meanings.sent2: The sudden jouk of the deer startled the hikers in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful jouk to the side made the toy miss her completely.
meanings.sent4: His jouk to the left saved him from bumping into the door.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected jouk of the car ahead caused a chain reaction of braking.
